dcterms:creator: Mingfu Wang
Hyejin Ku
dcterms:description: The Corporate Credit Rating Dataset contains 901 companies with 28 financial features from 2014 to 2016, categorized into investment and non-investment groups for assessing default risk, framing it as a binary classification task.
dcterms:title: Corporate Credit Rating Dataset

dcterms:creator: Anna Montoya
Kirill Odintsov
Martin Koteck
dcterms:description: The Home Credit Default Risk dataset addresses individual default risk, involving a binary classification task with target outputs indicating whether an individual repays the loan or not. It contains over 300,000 samples and 210 features, exhibiting significant class imbalance.
dcterms:title: Home Credit Default Risk dataset

dcterms:creator: Will Cukierski
dcterms:description: The Give Me Some Credit dataset focuses on individual default risk, comprising 150,000 data samples with 10 features. It exhibits substantial class imbalance, with a majority of non-default records.
dcterms:title: Give Me Some Credit dataset
